page.title: 16Tourism
page.content: Tourists seeking a quiet restful holiday enjoy this part of the Isle of Wight.Although this area forms part of the{scenic route}along the South Coast of the island,people visit here but stay in the more commercialised resorts.Accommodation is available for about 300 people at{Atherfield Holiday {Camp.}The majority of people staying at the camp travel by coach.In early season there were groups of Senior Citizens and School Groups.These holiday makers came from Nottingham, Coventry and London.They were enjoying a full-board type of holiday.We found no holiday homes available in this area although at{Chine Farm Chalets,} Winter and Summer lets were booked. Farmhouse accommodation which included Bed/Breakfast and Evening Meal was available at{Atherfield Farm House.
